00072 // TBD if namespaces are supported by Expat & libxml in an easy way, maybe do it here
00073 class SIM_API cXMLElement
00074 {
00075   public:
00080     class SIM_API ParamResolver
00081     {
00082       public:
00088         virtual bool resolve(const char *paramname, std::string& value) = 0;
00089         virtual ~ParamResolver() {}
00090     };
00091 
00092   private:
00093     std::string ename;
00094     std::string srcloc;
00095     std::string value;
00096     cXMLAttributeMap attrs;
00097     cXMLElement *parent;
00098     cXMLElement *firstchild;
00099     cXMLElement *lastchild;
00100     cXMLElement *prevsibling;
00101     cXMLElement *nextsibling;
00102 
00103   private:
00104      void doGetElementsByTagName(const char *tagname, cXMLElementList& list) const;
00105 
00106   public:
00107     // internal: Constructor
00108     cXMLElement(const char *tagname, const char *srcloc, cXMLElement *parent);
00109 
00110     // internal: sets text node within element
00111     virtual void setNodeValue(const char *s, int len);
00112 
00113     // internal: appends to text node within element
00114     virtual void appendNodeValue(const char *s, int len);
00115 
00116     // internal: Destructor. Destroys children too.
00117     virtual ~cXMLElement();
00118 
00119     // internal: Sets the value of the attribute with the given name.
00120     virtual void setAttribute(const char *attr, const char *value);
00121 
00122     // internal: Appends the given element at the end of the child element list.
00123     virtual void appendChild(cXMLElement *node);
00124 
00125     // internal: Inserts the given element just before the specified child element
00126     // in the child element list. The where element must be a child of this element.
00127     virtual void insertChildBefore(cXMLElement *where, cXMLElement *newnode);
00128 
00129     // internal: Removes the given element from the child element list.
00130     // The pointer passed should be a child of this element.
00131     virtual cXMLElement *removeChild(cXMLElement *node);
00132 
00133     // internal: matches from root element
00134     static cXMLElement *getDocumentElementByPath(cXMLElement *documentnode, const char *pathexpr, ParamResolver *resolver=NULL);
00135 
00136     // internal
00137     std::string tostr(int level) const;
00138 
00141 
00145     virtual const char *getTagName() const;
00146 
00151     virtual const char *getSourceLocation() const;
00152 
00157     virtual const char *getNodeValue() const;
00158 
00163     virtual const char *getAttribute(const char *attr) const;
00164 
00168     virtual bool hasAttributes() const;
00169 
00173     virtual const cXMLAttributeMap& getAttributes() const;
00175 
00181     virtual cXMLElement *getParentNode() const;
00182 
00186     virtual bool hasChildren() const;
00187 
00192     virtual cXMLElement *getFirstChild() const;
00193 
00198     virtual cXMLElement *getLastChild() const;
00199 
00215     virtual cXMLElement *getNextSibling() const;
00216 
00222     virtual cXMLElement *getPreviousSibling() const;
00223 
00228     virtual cXMLElement *getFirstChildWithTag(const char *tagname) const;
00229 
00244     virtual cXMLElement *getNextSiblingWithTag(const char *tagname) const;
00245 
00249     virtual cXMLElementList getChildren() const;
00250 
00254     virtual cXMLElementList getChildrenByTagName(const char *tagname) const;
00255 
00260     virtual cXMLElementList getElementsByTagName(const char *tagname) const;
00262 
00271     cXMLElement *getFirstChildWithAttribute(const char *tagname, const char *attr, const char *attrvalue=NULL) const;
00272 
00278     cXMLElement *getElementById(const char *idattrvalue) const;
00279 
00309     cXMLElement *getElementByPath(const char *pathexpression, cXMLElement *root=NULL, ParamResolver *resolver=NULL) const;

00314     void debugDump() const {ev << detailedInfo();}

00333 class SIM_API ModNameParamResolver : public cXMLElement::ParamResolver
00334 {
00335   protected:
00336     cModule *mod;
00337   public:
00338     ModNameParamResolver(cModule *mod)  {this->mod = mod;}
00339     virtual bool resolve(const char *paramname, std::string& value);
00340 };

00347 class SIM_API StringMapParamResolver : public cXMLElement::ParamResolver
00348 {
00349   public:
00350     typedef std::map<std::string,std::string> StringMap;
00351   protected:
00352     StringMap params;
00353   public:
00354     StringMapParamResolver(const StringMap& m)  {params = m;}
00355     virtual bool resolve(const char *paramname, std::string& value);
00356 };
